biotools.summary: Creates a new Genome Diff file that contains all entries that are still present in the input file after removing mutations that are in any of the subtracted Genome Diff files. All evidence and validation entries are retained in the output file.

bioschemas.name: gdtools_subtract
bioschemas.summary: Creates a new Genome Diff file that contains all entries that are still present in the input file after removing mutations that are in any of the subtracted Genome Diff files. All evidence and validation entries are retained in the output file.
